Manta has 50 companies under Coffee Shops in Kansas City, MO
+ Add Your Company for Free 1 Featured Company
Friendly Bean Coffee Company 420 NE Barry Rd , Kansas City MO 64155 map 0 Recommendations Fresh roasted coffee in the Northland. Has drive thur and seating. Come on by to the Friendly Bean and enjoy the greatest cup of coffee that you have ever had. Or try one of our fresh baked goods made from scratch right on site! Also take part in our buy 10 get a large free drink of your choice and get the most for your money. Additional Info: All our coffees are purchased at Fair Trade or above Fair Trade pricing. We support importers that are relatonship coffees, where the importers work directly with the farmers.
